No advertising, more exclusive weather content:
click here!

We have automatically detected that you're accessing our website from: Korea (ROK)

We have many different websites with the products you find here, customized for your country. If you switch to the website specific to your country, you'll be able to enjoy having your area set as the default domain for all our maps, and your country's most important cities in the forecast overview.

Switch to our website for Korea (ROK) Stay on current version

Forecast

Weather forecasts (today and tomorrow)

Loading weather forecasts for the following cities New York, Los Angeles, Chicago, Washington D.C., Seattle, Houston, Denver, Miami, Atlanta

What's new on weather.us?

Europe OPERA Composite

EUMETNET is creating a Europe-wide radar composite under the name OPERA.

Show EU OPERA-Composite

Facelift: Cyclone tracks

We have given the ECMWF ensemble tracks of tropical cyclones a facelift and not only visually prettied them up, you can now better recognize the expected category of hurricane, cyclone or typhoon.

Show cyclone tracks
